ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version

about.description:
LMDB is a fast, memory-efficient, embedded key-value store (it does
not require running an external daemon).
With memory-mapped files, it has the read performance of a pure
in-memory database while retaining the persistence of standard
disk-based databases.
python-lmdb is a Python binding for LMDB including a bundled
version of LMDB.
about.summary: Universal Python binding for the LMDB 'Lightning' Database

name: python-lmdb

about.description:
LMDB is a fast, memory-efficient, embedded key-value store (it does
not require running an external daemon).
With memory-mapped files, it has the read performance of a pure
in-memory database while retaining the persistence of standard
disk-based databases.
python-lmdb is a Python binding for LMDB including a bundled
version of LMDB.
about.summary: Universal Python binding for the LMDB 'Lightning' Database

about.description:
LMDB is a fast, memory-efficient, embedded key-value store (it does
not require running an external daemon).
With memory-mapped files, it has the read performance of a pure
in-memory database while retaining the persistence of standard
disk-based databases.
python-lmdb is a Python binding for LMDB including a bundled
version of LMDB.
about.summary: Universal Python binding for the LMDB 'Lightning' Database

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  version: "1.7.5"

package:
  name: python-lmdb
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/jnwatson/py-lmdb/archive/refs/tags/py-lmdb_${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 715a642f6d8df1dbd2ad47d30a567982350213388ab4559fb418be4c1eb3a320
  patches:
    - 0001-typedef-pid_t-on-win.patch

build:
  number: 0
  script: ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv

requirements:
  build:
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - python
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
    - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - if: unix
      then: patch
  host:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - if: win
      then: patch-ng
    - pip
  run:
    - python

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - lmdb
  - files:
      source:
        - tests
    requirements:
      run:
        - pytest
    script:
      - pytest tests

about:
  license: OLDAP-2.8
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Universal Python binding for the LMDB 'Lightning' Database
  description: |
    LMDB is a fast, memory-efficient, embedded key-value store (it does
    not require running an external daemon).
    With memory-mapped files, it has the read performance of a pure
    in-memory database while retaining the persistence of standard
    disk-based databases.
    python-lmdb is a Python binding for LMDB including a bundled
    version of LMDB.
  homepage: https://lmdb.readthedocs.io/
  repository: https://github.com/jnwatson/py-lmdb
  documentation: https://lmdb.readthedocs.io/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - pitrou
    - h-vetinari
    - xhochy

about.description:

With memory-mapped files, it has the read performance of a pure

python-lmdb is a Python binding for LMDB including a bundled

about.summary: Universal Python binding for the LMDB 'Lightning' Database
